alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; Noble (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 9:23AM EST until March 08 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan...Indiana... Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Berrien, St. Joseph and Elkhart Counties. Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Noble and Elkhart Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Elkhart River at Goshen. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Some residential and commercial properties near SR 119 are affected by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 5.3 feet and steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 8.3 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
